entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Bissett
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:59 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle mixed with light snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 8:04 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing drizzle. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle mixed with light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:04 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 8:04 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 12. Forecast issued 8:04 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 8:04 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 8:04 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 8:04 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 8:04 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 8:04 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9. Forecast issued 8:04 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 8:04 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 8:04 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
